Uses of Class
com.j2bugzilla.base.Comment

  • Packages that use Comment 
    Package Description
    com.j2bugzilla.rpc
    This package groups all of the remote procedure calls provided by the J2Bugzilla API.

    • Uses of Comment in com.j2bugzilla.rpc

      Methods in com.j2bugzilla.rpc that return types with arguments of type Comment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Comment> BugComments.getComments()
      Returns a List of all public comments made on the Bug requested from the installation
      Constructors in com.j2bugzilla.rpc with parameters of type Comment 
      Constructor and Description
      AddAttachment(Attachment attachment, Bug bug, Comment comment)
      Add a new Attachment to the specified Bug, with a descriptive Comment.
      CommentBug(Bug bug, Comment comment)
      Creates a new CommentBug object to add a Comment to an existing Bug in the client's installation
      CommentBug(int id, Comment comment)
      Creates a new CommentBug object to add a Comment to an existing Bug in the client's installation
